review: Terlalu mahal untuk harga seperti itu. Hotel lebih seperti hostel. Sangat sempit. Tua dan kurang bersih. Terlepas dari lokasinya memang dekat dengan USS dan vivo city dan juga free shuttle bus keliling pulau sentosa. Restaurant makanan sangat minimalis seperti hostel dan suasana restaurant lebih seperti resto saat perang vietnam.

Hotel lebih mirip dengan hostel, old fashioned hotel dan sangat sempit. Tidak cocok untuk yang membawa keluarga, untuk fasilitas tergolong bagus, kolam renang besar dan lokasi di sentosa island. Untuk sarapan sesuai dengan klasifikasi saya bahwa ini adalah kelas hostel tidak. Recommended dan harga terlalu mahal.
Hotel nyaman dan fasilitas oke. Depan hotel pantai dekat dengan stasiun.
ik.imagekit.io

Recommended banget menginap disini bawa anak-anak, kolam renangnya besar, pantai di depan hotel langsung, pilihan breakfastnya banyak dan enak. Staffnya ramah banget. dan lagi-lagi kita di upgrade ke kamar yang lebih besar. Terima kasih Siloso resort.
Lokasi sangat bagus di tepi pantai Siloso, kolam renang bagus, sarapan enak dan banyak jenisnya, food court juga dekat. Overall menyenangkan dan semoga bisa balik lagi ke sini.
ik.imagekit.io
ik.imagekit.io
ik.imagekit.io
Sangat menyenangkan sekali, saya mendapatkan kamar sangat dekat dengan kolam berenang dan beach view by window, makanan cukup enak ditemani dengan burung-burung staf ramah. Overall good.
We been staying here for 3 nights and the food here is nice but the pool closed at 7pm. A bit disappointed but overall was OK

Room size was OK, toilet a little small but not as issue! However, we found small spots of bloodstains on our duvet. Other than that, room service and staff were nice and friendly. A little sad we didn't get to visit/explore the pool etc tho so can't make a comment about that. Overall, still satisfied-ish w our stay.
We had so much fun staying there. Awesome!
Hot water not working in the showers but only for tap at basin. Temostat at aircon not working and room was freezing even after aircon was switched off for the whole night.

Check in was smooth. Requested for middle range floor and can see the beach (which we did had tat room last time we stayed) but then staff said all view block by trees. We know view were all blocked but not all rooms are totally blocked. Sad we can't get the one like previous time we stayed. Whenever we look out only trees. Ask check in counter staff is there breakfast & staff mentioned yes a Semi Buffet Breakfast for $20+ each pax & we tot since it's a semi buffet price is average so we paid for breakfast next morning & when ordered the restaurant staff said can only order one per pax and only once. So I'm confused what's all about the Semi Buffet that the check in staff mentioned to us? Should have just said it Ala Crate! Regarding the breakfast info given we're actually quite upset. Cleanliness was average & acceptable. Nice long pool with slide & next time gonna bring the kids. Try to grab for lunch but no driver wanna take our orders. Ended up we takeaway some snacks & bites from Bikini Bar. Pumped shower gel provided is better than those bottles one given. TV channels was great and we enjoyed our time watching lots of oldies movies. First time requested ice in a bag to chill our wine is free but subsequent will be chargeable. Fridge very small but it's alright for us. Bed & pillow super comfortable & we had a great sleep waking up the next morning refreshed.
My second time staying at this hotel. Like the superb location and the theme of ECO friendly creation by the hotel.
Had a great stay. Location is superb. Very near the beach. The pool was great! Staff was very helpful. The cafe/restaurant was not to be missed out.
Highly recommend for those who love pools and nature such a blissful memory celebration 33rd birthday of my wife here! Great service and clean. Most worth it was the long pool surrounded by nature!
Great location and close to a lot of activities. Huge swimming pool. Super friendly staff too. Facilities are a bit outdated though.

Everything is good except for one thing 😅 as now is not peak season, I have requested check out one hour late and request was granted. The room looks find except for the bed. Some blood satin can still be clearly seen and I actually hesitate to sleep on it. I lazy to change and to avoid troubel, I have used up my whole alcohol spray. Hope they can look into this issue as I can see other similar comment too.
Pros: The location is superb. Cons: The rooms need upgrading! Surroundings were very dirty. The hotel needs proper maintenance. All outdated. Need total renovation.
2-Hours queue for checking in, has to queue outside in the rain 🥺.

A rather pleasant surprise to find such a hotel similar to bali vibes. Room wise nothing much to shout out about - it’s pretty simple and furnished with most of the necessities. But location wise pretty central to most things on the siloso/palawan beaches. Has a waterfall and a mini slide in the 85m long pool. Do visit the rooftop garden as well as the unblocked view of the beach/sea.

The fridge doesn’t work really well. The hotel area is kinda dirty and unkempt. The room I stayed at is clean tho. It is difficult to access without private car, as we cannot bring luggage in the sentosa shuttle. You’d have to go there by walking from the monorail station or hail a cab. You’ll get free 3 day pass monorail ticket. Breakfast is really good. They don’t serve pork so it is good for muslims. This hotel is great for those who wants easy access to the beach.
it's just perfect for family and have a good place to spend your days in relax and fun of Sentosa island

Room were small. But just nice for 2.. Staff were wonderful.. Love the swimming pool.. Breakfast was normal.. Walking distance to the free shuttle.. Do take their free guide around their hotel.. Is an eye opener.. Really enjoyed staying here..
Nice room. Good view. Delicious breakfast. Wanna stay again. Awesome swmming pool.
Good hotel, good position, clean room
Looks like an old hotel, but everything was nice! The swimming pool is awesome and my kids like it very much!

Resort looks good and clean. My room view looks straight to the beach, which looks awesome. Staff is nice. Food is tasty. Everything worthes at its price. One of the things I was impressed is that when we were about to checkout but still at an attraction, we made a phone call to tell staff about our situation and they agreed late checkout, says 12:30pm. But we couldn't make it finally, we checked out at 1:15pm but without extra charge. Surprised. That was really a good service.

It was a great decision to stay at Siloso Beach Resort. Was a bit skeptical reading the negative reviews but none were proven to be true! My daughter enjoyed the stay so much, it's near to the beach and they have awesome waterfall swimming pool with spring water! Thumbs up to the service staff too!
The pool is really really great with the waterfall.

I stayed with my family, children are very happy to stay here because they can swim every day. The building was indeed old but every room seemed to have been renovated. The most pleasant thing is that the hotel is filled with large trees, I really like it and the staff are also friendly, and of course because it's close to the beach

The room condition is so old and not clean. The toilet water system is too noisy with sound bumping the whole night. Breakfast is not nice, not have variety of food. Indeed it is not 4 star at all. It is worse than some 2 star hotel/resort.
nice services, nice room and nice atmosphere
There are stain on the bed sheet when I checked in.

The pool give my kids so much fun with the slide on it, but the water little bit salty. I get breakfast at hotel, it didn't provide much variety of food menu but it still good (my wife love the yogurt). Atmosphere at hotel is very relaxing, in front of my room there is fish pond and in front of my windows is beach. Staff very friendly and nice, surely will back here in the future.

Despite being the cheapest hotel in Sentosa, the price is actually not that cheap. We paid $268 for a night and I felt like staying some budget hotel instead of a 4-star hotel! The aircon is noisy and the pillows are the worst... each person gets 2 pillows so both of us got 4 and all of them are different, in a bad way, either too hard or too thick or too bouncy...anything but comfortable. The pillow quality is not a hotel standard. I couldn't sleep well on it (i tried all 4) and woke up with stiff neck! The blanket is also too small for a queen size bed. This hotel reminds me of my stay in a hostel in a kampong area in indonesia that costed me 40bux a night. I didn't mean to cruelly complain about this hotel, but the guests deserve better quality with that price tag. The breakfast is just so-so, the butter kaya toast is made of margarine instead of butter...and the spoon and fork are not a set; the spoons are longer.. I don't usually complain to this extent of details but I just feel we deserve better effort from the hotel.
Nice hotel. Good location near the beach and train.
The room quite dark, less lamp and my room a little bit moist. One thing that I don't like suddenly there was water inside my room like leaking from outside. But for the environment was quite nice.

I have a surprise when breakfast time, because there is peacock come near my toddler son. There is many birds and squirrel too. My kids feel so happy here. There is a falling water too that have a function to realese stress. And jacuzzi, and very wide swimming pool. There is water slide for kids too. Breakfast taste delicious and I get a free card for transportation via Sentosa express. It's very recommended for family vacation. Because the location is in siloso beach so, when we wake up in the morning, we can see the beautiful beach... Just we feel not so comfortable without jet washer in the bathroom.
It was a great experience to stay at Siloso beach resort.

nice eco resort, we enjoy our holiday in here. pool off-course very beautiful, breakfast is good, friendly staff, nice beach. just one note that, the beach tram is close after 8pm, so if you go by sentosa express after 8pm, you have to walk to resort (10' minute) from beach station. I definitely will come back this resort again.
My experience at Siloso Beach Resort is ok because it is near the beach area and the pool is also great. I also enjoyed my breakfast.
No sea view, no double bed, tv quality not good, shower head type and water pressure not appropriate, breakfast run out of food
Best getaway hotel in Sentosa. Close to nature. Enjoy the sight of a few peacock while having breakfast.
ik.imagekit.io

I would recommend this resort for those people whom love nature very much. As for the room, looks kinda old and there are a few ants on the table. Seems like haven't been repainting for sometimes. The staff was ok and the food was good but not great. The best part of the resort was the pool.

The rooms are so comfort and clean.
Very good views ... it's ok for family traveling... the location is near Siloso beach.
It's a good hotel, but quite old. Facility and surrounding was great. But don't put your leftover food in room, it attract ants...and the management put the reminder as well.
Very nice place & very clean, but the restaurant need to be level up i think :)
The beach just in front of the hotel. The pool is great and has a hottub also, so you can swim anytime you want. The breakfast has many choices.
really a nice hotel with amazing view. located near siloso beach and has nice swimming pool on 5th floor. had good breakfast as well. will stay there again for sure when I visit Sentosa next time.
Room was full of smell, equipment looks old, not value for the money

Great location, right across siloso beach and clubs, walk distance to sentosa MRT station. Good service, got upgraded room from superior to deluxe. Lots of hotel' spot need renovation. Breakfast not recommended, better go to coastes nearby.
service, rooms, and food was good. we have nice stay
The hotel needs renovation. The shower is not good, the other side of pool areas is not clean.
Clean room. Very close to Siloso beach bus stop. You can walk ~5min to reach beach station (sentosa express line like monorail in kl).
The price worth the quality. Kudos for their effort in promoting sustainable business, and inclusive staff-some of their staffs are disable, but they did a great job.
Good environment, friendly staff, beauty swimming pool and view, feel great to stay at this hotel.

The location is nice, it’s just in front of the beach and there’s plenty of cafe and bar nearby. For 4 stars hotel, i’d say that the food was just okay, the room was okay. We really love the pool, and the staff are very friendly.

Affordable price,spring pool, peace and silence environtment, good for relaxing, green area, near siloso beach, they hire dissable people, big room. But, need to improve the cleanliness, 10 mins walking from siloso point (cable car station), better to get food for dinner before 7pm, it's such a silent place after dark. Not many restaurants are in the area
Food not variations for 4 star hotel, all is ok, receptionist in level 8
Nice hotel. Siloso beach hotel is good
It's very convenient for those who live in sentosa island
Nice hotel. Good for the rest holiday
A nice hotel and service, easy for going everywhere. Recomended !
Old hotel in Santosa, the room is humid, the view from room only tree, few facility, the elevator is too old.

If you want to enjoy the Universal Studio, this is the hotel you must stay. In terms of location, it is so great. Also, if you have enough time, you can easily feel one of beaches in Singapore. There are a lot of rides or fun things at this Sentoasa island. Just regretted that I did not buy several tickets in advance.
Good ambiance. Nice swimming pool.

While we stayed at siloso our grandpa get a bit sick Looking to his condition the hotel staff pay a very good attention and caring. They not just offered us some special assistance but also emphatically they given us an extra stay (late check out until 6pm) to give us a chance for our grandpa (83 yrs old) to be more recovered It's really help us a lot Thank you so much SBR! We'll comeback soonest.
Nice resort. We love the holiday. Thanks.
Ok. Nice resort. Thanks, Siloso Beach Resort. We love it.
It's a great place with the beach just in front of the hotel. The pool is so big
I don't like this hotel because the service and cleanliness is bad.
Nice place, good ambiance, good for kids.

Nice hotel. But small room size for that price. Near to everywhere when you in sentosa. Shuttle car always in charge until 10 PM. Easy to go and back to the hotel. But they less for the food variation when you pay room with breakfast. And theres only 1-2 staff to bring ur luggage into ur room. Its ok but you have to be patient. But its fine for us.

A truly natural green ambience hotel. A greeny surrounding is make the vacation more perfect. Just need some chocolote spread like nutella for breakfast time....it's more great!. Thanks siloso beach resort

An hotel with the natural ambience. Very good for family vacation and those whose like greeny life. My teenagers kids like this hotel. Just need an chocolate spread for the croissant breakfast. Thanks Siloso Beach Resort!
Close to the beach but a bit hard to reach the hotel if the sentosa monorail operation time is over
Fun filled with enough entertainment.. the waterfall and pool slide was awesome
Great view, value for money. Overall great
Very nice and uniqe resort but very far from sentosa gateway.
Nice place for family vacation. The view is very good. We can see the beach from our room, we just open our curtains. The employees are very friendly.
reasonable price, good location!
Nice place for relaxation..good service..
Near beach, near center of attraction
good. I would recommend to others
Good place ...romantic...i'm so happy at siloso
Very nice, friendly and comfortable
quiet nice hotel, away from crowded, recommended for honeymoon. front beach resort!
nice experience with the family...
Great service, cause we get free upgrades.. thanks a lot Siloso beach resort.. will coming back!!
We have nice and great fam holiday
Small room but comfort...great location...great pool
over all nice, but the food no taste too plain,

I like the eco feel of the place, with lots of nature. The cafe hires some people with special needs. The pool is nice, with a long slide which my kids enjoyed. The breakfast can add some more variety, but since it comes free with the room, I guess there is not really a lot to ask for or be picky about.
Room is dirty and not enough amenities
Next time, I will stay here again for the beach and the pool. About the room, it's at average.
Great Place for Family The Swimming Pool was Good.
Take bus from restaurant instead of lobby
Reasonable rate in Sentosa, near beach.
No Wifi In The Room Anyway This Really Important For Traveler
The hotel has a good location, good concept but has deteriorated. Hope to be renovated soon in the future.
Well, near the sea, parking is convenient.
The quality and variety of food is not worth the price of a hotel that is quite expensive.
Suasana hotel yang tenang cocok untuk rilek dekat dengan pantai siloso. jauh dari casino.
It's quite pleasant to stay here, the hotel is also pretty good especially supported by various facilities around it.

Please for everyone who wants to go to Singapore. It's even better to stay overnight on the island and at Siloso Beach Resort, so the hotel is really great everywhere, the beach is there, the swimming pool is there, the hot spring pool is there, the fast train is close, the tamas is close, especially the service is satisfying. I am 1 family very satisfied. God willing, if there is a vacation again, we will go there again, amen, even though with a wreck, bring 3 suitcases and small children.

We stayed here 3 nights, for the location of the hotel to be easily reached there is free transportation until midnight from Vivo city to this hotel, we are also given a free ticket Sentosa express during the stay. So access to Universal and Vivo city, beaches and Merlion sculptures is easier. Breakfast is also okay for breakfast. Complete enough, conclusion: this hotel is suitable for those of you who like a lot of natural and relaxed atmosphere.
The price of a night's stay is pretty good but the cleanliness in the room isn't because of a lot of ants.

The rooms are exactly like the photos, just love, I ask for a room with a beach view, but given the most corner room, it only looks trees and doesn't look at the beach at all. For the swimming pool it's okay, it blends with nature and there's a problem.
Standard hotel, enough to stay at Sentosa Island. Don't forget to prepare 50 for a deposit or you can use it.
Spacious room, friendly staff. The next visit will be with the family.
Resort that is very close to the beach, a beautiful hotel atmosphere, a unique swimming pool as if united with nature is only a variation of food that is lacking. Overall fun.
Comfortable and clean rooms. Good service. Location near the beach and very beautiful scenery. I will come back to stay

Its location near the beach, many friendly staff who can speak indonesian very helpful, good service. At the receptionist, you can leave your belongings before check-in time. The facilities are okay, making things easy. Very recommended.
A very beautiful place and also very comfortable. Really recommended.
The floor is sticky with a lot of ants, towels can only be used for two baths, there are no other towels, lack of cleanliness.
The hotel room smells disturbing
Really a good hotel for a family vacation. rooms are spacious enough. friendly service. many receptionists can speak Indonesian.

Old school hotel may be one of the first in Sentosa, which relies on eco tourists, a tropical forest atmosphere with waterfalls. The rooms are quite narrow unlike other hotels in RWS. Breakfast is also quite simple.
Old school hotel that has been renovated nuanced Eco + Tourism / biodiversity in front of Siloso beach
Not too clean and breakfast not tasty.
Very beautiful hotel, so natural but clean.
Enough. Not bad for a vacation with family.
Rooms are quite spacious, service is fast

The location is quiet and comfortable. Eco green eco-concept hotel and close to nature, strategic karna, in one hotel two advantages gained that is nature and beach. The most memorable, this hotel is inclusive, friendly humanity, diversity and disability, we really appreciate the hotel empowering staff disability and become part of our tour. the best eco green and humanity

For a good overall, the location of the hotel directly in front of the beach, and easy access from the beach station using the bus trum, just maybe because the concept is like in the middle of the forest so sometimes there are insects, for breakfast is less varied and I did not find rice
Breakfast was tasty and fit bgt, beach was clean.

Swimming pool is really okay !! The room is also ok sbner'a hell .. this is just according to taste aj, because the taste of different people "khan.So for me personally do not like the same room'a design Thanks
although the rooms are a little small but cozy deket where the atmosphere is also very beautiful ...
The hotel is cool, from the sea view room window, breakfast by the sea, cool
Swimming pool is ok. room and cleanliness ok. only a lot of ants found in the room. but overall okay.
Hotels close to Studios Universal. Vanger natural atmosphere, neat cleanliness lacking
Cool and happy happy

The rooms are small but the bed is quite comfortable and the staff is not complicated. Drinking water is provided by the dispenser in the lobby. The food is really delicious. Especially the seafood. When I asked for Halal, the food receptionist said that the hotel does not provide pork.
Cool for nature-style holidays but poorly maintained in some spots. overall fun anyway with a swimming pool in the middle of an artificial forest.
Comfortable and suitable to bring family for holidays
Very cool and asik.kpn2 want to go back again

Initially I got room in 524, the room can be said not in accordance with the budget I spend, because I booked a deluxe room, then I complained to the reseptionist, we served well, we finally moved to room 615, this room is ideal with a budget I spent, the location on sentosa island, the view of the beach view, the front of the pool room, the recommendation and can have breakfast impressions stay here very satisfied with the service .. if back to sentosa island of course we will stay here again
The hotel is unkempt..utk breakfast food served impressed origin .. and not good ..
Shower shower dark no lights
The location of the hotel is very strategic and comfortable
The hotel is very good and the view of the view from the hotel is nice 😊👍
The hotel rooms are nice, the cleanliness outside the rooms is lacking, the wifi is not good alias slow.
Disappointing Services & Cleanliness
The pool view is nice but the rooms are a bit dirty ..
Can not view beach, unlike 4 star hotel

The hotel is synonymous with wood so its moist, the wi fi is not until the hotel room only in the pool and restaurant, away from the mosque, luggage until the recepsionist also no one bawain. But not bad lah, because there is across the beach and there is free bus access to the streets in Sentosa
The hotel room is nice and delish the beach front so it really suited for the hobby to the beach
Pretty good hotel and swimming Kolem
Comfortable hotel with the feel of a beautiful, dear cuman rooftopnya less manicured, overalls so recommended.
Near the beach. Quite clean and comfortable
Very nice hotel for a family holiday. Comfortable environment and easy access for walking in sentosa
Rooms are upgraded. The location is suitable for a vacation. However, the wifi network is not good, not up to the room.
Really suitable for holidays ....

Quite comfortable. It's just that I got my room shut down and downstairs. View of the sea is somewhat obstructed by trees and buildings. The fish pond front rooms are a bit dirty. Across from Mambo beach club. Overall, very comfortable.
Terhemat hotel on Sentosa Island.
Dirty, unfriendly, uncomfortable.
The rooms are nice just the environment is less manicured
All over the heck is okay .. Only wifi its course can not be disconnected in the room .. That's about the same on the 5th floor in the cafe aja ..
The food could be considered very rich in standard 3 star hotel, and if anyone can not B. English .. mr. Sam will help you .. overall is nice
Nice, and the location is cool, close to the sights
The location is okay, food is less variation

Good hotel. Natural. Many trees. The location is pleasant. Suitable for honeymoon couples. Lgsg view facing the beach. Quiet. Fused with nature. The hotel facilities are also complete. The rooms are spacious, clean, the amenities of the rooms are complete.
Nice place, easy access.
wifi in the hotel could not be used
